thread.section_title: Usgobuy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Usgobuy | www.usgobuy.com | 3 of 10
thread.title: Jamal Jamalullail

author: Jamal Jamalullail
title: Jamal Jamalullail
text:
I like service from usgobuy. Like when I did not understand about the account verification, but the staff they guide me to perform verification steps.
And at other times, the cost for the delivery of goods which I send in excess of the official fee rates and their staff returned the excess costs are entered into my deposit. Service was good honest and open. Good Usgobuy !
